messages.subject: strewing ideas
messages.msgSnippet: Oh, I d join you in Columbi hell in a heartbeat. I LOVE warmer weather but not so hot that you roast either. What is your weather like most of the year. Maybe
messages.messageBody:
"Oh, I'd join you in Columbi hell in a heartbeat. I LOVE warmer
weather but not
so hot that you roast either.

What is your weather like most of the year. Maybe we'll move there!"

You want Eastern TN!:) Jonesborough is at 1700feet, so it keeps
summers relatively mild. It can get hot but not for that long (I'm
comparing to that other hellishly hot place though...Pensacola).

Winters are colder, with some snow, but each season only lasts about
three months. Perfect.

Ren
